decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of five years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority (before the building is used).

Condition : 3 - The premises shall be used for the preparation and service of food and drink for consumption on the premises, and there shall be no sale of food and drinks for consumption off the premises.
Condition : 4 - The use hereby permitted shall not be open to customers outside the following times  [1100 to 2330 Monday to Saturday and 1200 to 2230 Sundays and public holidays].
Condition : 5 - The waste and recycled materials storage arrangements shown on the approved drawing shall be completed before any part of the accommodation hereby permitted is occupied.

Condition : 6 - Before the development is commenced, a scheme for protecting the residential accommodation from excessive internally generated noise shall be submitted to  and approved by the Local Planning Authority, and any works which form part of such a scheme should be completed before the restaurant  hereby approved is first occupied.

Condition : 7 - The use shall not commence until a scheme for control of fumes and odours including details of sound attenuation for any necessary plant has been submitted to and approved by the Local Planning Authority in writing.
Condition : 8 - The scheme approved under condition 7 (control of fumes) shall be fully implemented before the restaurant opens to customers.

Condition : 9 - The use shall not commence until a scheme for the ventilation of the premises of an appropriate outlet level, including details of sound attenuation for any necessary plant and the standard or dilution expected has been submitted to and approved by the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 10 - The parking, loading and turning spaces shown on drawing No.779/LON/1 shall be constructed and available for use before first occupation of any part of the development and such spaces shall not be used for any other purposes.

Condition : 11 - The access doorway to the restaurant shall have a minimum clear width of 900mm, a level surface or ramp between the pavement and the floor and a door handle of not more than 1m above ground level.
description: Change of use from retail (A1) to resturant (A3) in connection with existing resturant at 777.
